summary: THE BRAKE PEDAL GOES TOO FAR BEFORE ENGAGING.   I'VE HAD THE BRAKE FLUID REPLACED AND AFTER ABOUT 6 MONTHS, THE PROBLEM HAS OCCURED AGAIN.   THE RESEARCH THAT I HAVE DONE SHOWS THAT IT IS A PROBLEM WITH THE ABS ACTUATOR.  THERE'S APPEARS TO BE A FAULT THAT ALLOWS PRESSURE TO BLEED PAST THE VALVES IN THE ACTUATOR.  THIS IS A SERIOUS PROBLEM AS STOPPING DISTANCE IS AFFECTED.  THERE NEEDS TO BE A RECALL.
